column4: i will buy and amd athlon II x4 with 64 bits support, should I install Ubuntu 64bits version?
how many ram does it have¿
what is the key combination to restar the computer, it was like REISUB or something like that
try 64bit then, you can also use 32bit with no problem
but i have heard of some problems on 64bit version
the only issue with 32bit is it doesn't detect 4gb of ram but you can detect them with !pae
and second it isnt compatible with all of the programs
btw how do i send you a private message like u?
how do i send you a private message like your last message?
what else, besides recognizing more than 3.2gb ram, the 64bit version can do?
with !pae 32bit can detect more than 3.2bgof ram
